Summary: appeared in N.E. to E., stopped became really bright, dimmed and then moved on to south
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife, son, and myself were on our deck the night of 6-21-09 enjoying our fire pit.. we were watching the sky and enjoying the beautiful evening...we noticed several aircraft crossing the sky in different directions and also a couple of sats. going from south to north...it had been a few minutes when my wife and I at almost the same time noticed another light approach from the north headed south, and made the comment here comes another plane ! At that moment, the light stopped, became super bright, dimmed and then moved off to the southeast behind the treeline with a much smaller object following at a consistent distance.... We saw it again on 7-25-09, higer in the sky this night, suddenly appearing in the east, getting brighter, then accelerating out of sight...
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Columbia
There were no other sightings in Columbia on or around June 21st 2009
